title: Concept Map-Based Customized Science Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific concepts and understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Learners can access simple digital resources using smartphones, and learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized science learning pathways using Educational Concept Maps (ECMs).
Learners can select core concepts and diagnose prior knowledge gaps based on self-assessment.
Learners can organize a learning material system considering interconnections between concepts and apply it to project tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
